credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: details of male figures
medium: obverse: black, sanguine crayon, white chalk, on salmon-pink paper. Reverse: Black crayon on salmon-pink paper.
description: Vertical rectangle. Above: studies of male figures, emphasizing the legs. Below, left: bust-length study of a man blowing a trumpet, facing right in profile.
name: Drawing
